calculator.title: Thinning Solvent for Sealer and Topcoat
calculator.item: Hudson®® Polyurethane Floor Varnish Reducer
calculator.note: System indicated is applied using brush. For spray application, thin not more than 1:1 mixing ratio of Hudson®® Polyurethane Reducer.
